sentences.en: A large part of state regulation consists of occupational licensing.
sentences.cn: 大部分州的管理涉及行业的特许批准.

sentences.en: All companies must comply with the regulations .
sentences.cn: 所有公司都必须遵守规定。

sentences.en: Both the Brady Commission and the SEC called for greater regulation.
sentences.cn: 布雷迪委员会和证券交易委员会均提出要加强管制.

sentences.en: Competition between companies is too fierce for self-regulation to work.
sentences.cn: 公司间的竞争过于激烈，自我调节机制已无法发挥作用。

sentences.en: He explains this regulation to me word for word.
sentences.cn: 他逐字逐句地替我解释这项条例.

sentences.en: He was fined 200 dollars for violation of traffic regulation.
sentences.cn: 他因违反交通规则被罚款200美元.

sentences.en: Infringement of the regulation is punishable by a fine.
sentences.cn: 违反规则应处以罚款。

sentences.en: regulations governing the safety of toys
sentences.cn: 监控玩具安全的条例

sentences.en: Ships were registered abroad to circumvent employment and safety regulation.
sentences.cn: 船只在外国注册以逃避有关雇佣和安全的规定.

sentences.en: The bus driver violated the traffic regulation.
sentences.cn: 汽车司机违反了交通规则.

sentences.en: The regulation allows of no variation.
sentences.cn: 这规则不得改变.

sentences.en: The regulation has no application to this particular case.
sentences.cn: 那项规则不适用于这一特定情况.

sentences.en: the regulation of public spending
sentences.cn: 对公共开支的管理

sentences.en: the regulation of public spending.
sentences.cn: 对公共开支的管理

sentences.en: The regulation was perfunctorily carried out.
sentences.cn: 规章执行得很马虎.

sentences.en: There is a regulation against adulterated cosmetics.
sentences.cn: 规定禁止出售假冒化妆品。

sentences.en: There seem to be so many rules and regulations these days.
sentences.cn: 如今好像条条框框很多。

sentences.en: These sections concern testing, premanufacturing clearance , and regulation of manufacturing and distribution.
sentences.cn: 这些条款涉及到检验 、 制造前的批准, 以及制造过程中和供销过程中的管理.

sentences.en: They may be excused from complying with this regulation.
sentences.cn: 他们可以不按这条规则行事.

sentences.en: This regulation is binding on everybody.
sentences.cn: 本规则皆须遵守.

words.tran_cn: 调节，规定；控制；校准；有系统的管理

phrases.tran_cn: 行政法规；行政管理规章
政府法规，政府调控；政府监管
负载调整率；负载调节；负载第
市场调节；市场监管；市场管理
稳压；电压调整；电压变动率

trans.tran_cn: 规定的，必须穿戴的，必须使用的
trans.tran_en: used or worn because of official rules
